    • Uses of UpdateOptions in io.vertx.ext.mongo

      Methods in io.vertx.ext.mongo that return UpdateOptions 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      UpdateOptions UpdateOptions.setMulti(boolean multi)
      Set whether multi is enabled
      UpdateOptions UpdateOptions.setReturningNewDocument(boolean returnNewDocument)
      Set whether new document property is enabled.
      UpdateOptions UpdateOptions.setUpsert(boolean upsert)
      Set whether upsert is enabled
      UpdateOptions UpdateOptions.setWriteOption(WriteOption writeOption)
      Set the write option

      instead use MongoClient.replaceDocumentsWithOptions(String, JsonObject, JsonObject, UpdateOptions, Handler)
